item.title: Git Basics
item.description: Initialize repo from exiting code git init To check status of files Before commit you can check status of files, like tracked/untracked git status .gitignore Add entries of files in .gitignore you want to exclude from commit. Create a file touch .gitignore Mention whatever you want to exclude like .data .project *.pyc .ipynb_checkpoints */.ipynb_checkpoints/* Add files to staging area To add all files git add -A To add individually

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a software engineer with 12 years of experience. Since 1 year, I have been interested in the field of machine learning. Currently, I am honing my ML expertise and hoping to have a full-time ML job soon.
